titlestmt.titleproper: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, History, RG 12
A Guide to the John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, History, RG 12 FA1806

did.unittitle: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, History, RG 12

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Record Group 12 contains information related to the Knight Foundation history project. It contains the final version of "The Knight Foundation History" by Virginia Henke. Also included are photographs, clippings, and transcripts of the oral history interviews that were used to write the history.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Material less than 10 years old is restricted.

Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Knight Foundation has title, copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them.

The Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish material from the collection. Permission to publish extensive excerpts, or material in its entirety, will be referred to the Knight Foundation.
